page.title: 03FAMILY LIFE
page.content: Most families in West Calder and Polbeth like to live a quiet life.They have three meals a day usually breakfast,lunch and dinner.For dinner,which is the main meal and eaten between 5p.m.and 6p.m.,most people would have three courses being soup,meat and vegetables and a sweet. During the week days people go to work or school and most people wait until Friday or Saturday to have an evening out during the week they stay at home and watch t.v.or follow a hobby.What people wear depends on the weather.In the Summer they wear light clothes but in Winter they wrap up well as it is very cold here at that time of year.The people here are generous and contribute to many charities they are also anilmal lovers and most have pets.
